name: Bairy
description:
You will need 2 Controllers and a Friend to play this.
(or you can try your luck with the keyboard)

You each control a fairy,  your goal is to shoot down your rival.

Gather Berries to Power up. When your fruit circle fills up, you grow and become more powerful. Use your power to shoot down your enemy or to shield up. Keep an eye on your flight meter, if it depletes you won't be able to fly for a while, let your fairy touch the ground to rest quickly.
